name: ASB Research
slogan: Proprietary high frequency investment strategies in online sport betting markets

jobs.title: Part Time Java Developer
jobs.description:
Approach:
- part-time (2 days per week - fully remote but based in London)
- 1 ad hoc meeting pm face to face in our office in Liverpool Street
- Package: participation to company investment dividends every 6 months + 5/10 % company share + 500 £ pm

Responsibilities will include:
- Develop software using modern engineering approaches and agile principles
- Make our technology and our team scale as the business grows
- Own your deliverables from start to finish
- Deliver high quality solutions
- Work with machine learning engineers to productionise ML Models
- Participate in high-level technical decisions
- Mentor and empower other developers around you

Desired skills and experience:
- Computer Science or similar degree
- 1+ years of relevant full-time experience
- Strong Java and multithreading skills
- Experience with Memcached
- Analytical and problem-solving skills
- Vivid interest in football and preferably online betting

jobs.title: Javascript UI Developer Part-Time
jobs.description:
Approach:
- part-time (2 days per week - fully remote but based in London)
- 1 ad hoc meeting pm face to face in our office in Moorgate
- Package: participation to company investment dividends every 6 months + 2% company share + 500 £ pm

Responsibilities will include:
- Develop cutting-edge trading software GUI
- Use modern engineering approaches and agile principles
- Make our technology and our team scale as the business grows
- Own your deliverables from start to finish
- Deliver high quality frontend solutions
- Participate in high-level technical decisions

Desired skills and experience:
- Computer Science or similar degree
- 2+ years of relevant full-time experience
- Javascript UI development 
- React (Redux, RXJS, ReactJS)

Beneficial but not essential:
- UI design
- Interest for math and trading
- Vivid interest in football and preferably online betting

Approach:

  • part-time (2 days per week - fully remote but based in London)

Responsibilities will include:

Beneficial but not essential:

  • Vivid interest in football and preferably online betting
